presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.presentation_description: Hello, I am a computer science student passionate about web and mobile development. I love learning new technologies and applying them in personal projects to improve my skill level and technical knowledge. Currently doing an apprenticeship at Netim as a PHP developer.
